Description: This registry defines the Update Service messages for Redfish

DownloadFirmware.Description: Indicates that device is downloading firmware image file from Remote Server.
DownloadFirmware.Message: Device is downloading firmware image file from Remote Path - %1 for action %2.

DownloadFirmwareFailed.Description: Indicates that device download firmware image file from Remote Server failed.
DownloadFirmwareFailed.Message: Devcie download firmware image file from Remote Path - %1 for action %2 failed.

DownloadFirmwareSuccessful.Description: Indicates that device download firmware image file from Remote Server successfully.
DownloadFirmwareSuccessful.Message: Device download firmware image file from Remote Path - %1 for action %2 successfully.

FirmwareUpdateCompleted.Description: Indicates that device firmware update is completed.

FirmwareUpdateFailed.Description: Indicates that device firmware update is failed.

FlashFirmware.Description: Indicates that device is flashing firmware.
FlashFirmware.Message: Device is flashing firmware for action %1.

FlashFirmwareFailed.Description: Indicates that device flash firmware update failed.
FlashFirmwareFailed.Message: Device flash firmware update for action %1 failed.

InvalidFirmwareImageFormat.Description: Indicates that uploaded firmware image is not a valid one.
InvalidFirmwareImageFormat.Message: The uploaded %1 is not a valid firmware image. Acceptable firmware image formats are .ima or .ima_enc
InvalidFirmwareImageFormat.Resolution: Resubmit the request with the valid firmware image.

InvalidSignKeyFormat.Description: Indicates that uploaded signed key is not a valid one.
InvalidSignKeyFormat.Message: The uploaded %1 is not a valid signed key. Acceptable signed key extension is .pem
InvalidSignKeyFormat.Resolution: Resubmit the request with the valid signed key.

PrepareFlashArea.Description: Indicates that device is prepareing flash area for firmware update.
PrepareFlashArea.Message: Device is prepareing flash area for action %1.

PrepareFlashAreaFailed.Description: Indicates that device prepare flash area failed.
PrepareFlashAreaFailed.Message: Device prepare flash area for action %1 failed.

PrepareFlashAreaSuccessful.Description: Indicates that device prepare flash area successfully.
PrepareFlashAreaSuccessful.Message: Device prepare flash area for action %1 successfully.

PrepareUpdate.Description: Indicates that device is prepareing firmware update.
PrepareUpdate.Message: Device is prepareing flash firmware for action %1.

StartFirmwareUpdate.Description: Indicates that action was submitted to do firmware update.
StartFirmwareUpdate.Message: The action %1 was submitted to do firmware update.

VerifyFirmware.Description: Indicates that device is verifying firmware image file.
VerifyFirmware.Message: Device is verifying firmware image file which from Remote Path - %1 for action %2.

VerifyFirmwareFailed.Description: Indicates that device verify firmware image file failed.
VerifyFirmwareFailed.Message: Device verify firmware image file which from Remote Path - %1 for action %2 failed.

VerifyFirmwareSuccessful.Description: Indicates that device verify firmware image file successfully.
VerifyFirmwareSuccessful.Message: Device verify firmware image file which from Remote Path - %1 for action %2 successfully.

VerifySignKey.Description: Indicates that device is verifying sign key file.
VerifySignKey.Message: Device is verifying sign key file which from Remote Path - %1 for action %2.

VerifySignKeyFailed.Description: Indicates that device verify sign key file failed.
VerifySignKeyFailed.Message: Device verify sign key file which from Remote Path - %1 for action %2 failed.

VerifySignKeySuccessful.Description: Indicates that device verify sign key file successfully.
VerifySignKeySuccessful.Message: Device verify sign key file which from Remote Path - %1 for action %2 successfully.

Name: Update Service Message Registry
